info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 11:36AM EDT until April 22 at 12:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Mecklenburg County in south central Virginia... Eastern Lunenburg County in south central Virginia... Nottoway County in south central Virginia... Northwestern Dinwiddie County in south central Virginia... Northwestern Brunswick County in south central Virginia... * Until 1215 PM EDT. * At 1136 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near South Hill, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Kenbridge and Dundas around 1155 AM EDT. Fort Pickett around 1210 PM EDT. Blackstone, Nottoway, Spainville and Wilsons around 1215 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Gary, Bacons Fork, North Wellville, Irby, Gills Corner, Barrows Store, Murdocks, Forkland, The Falls and Forksville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
